price: 10. Ee sug Maalinta ay samadu keeni qiiq muuqda.
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
